articles.title: Group of Limerick ceramic artists join potter's market line-up
articles.description: The Clare Potter's Market takes place on June 21 and 22 at Ballymorris Pottery.
articles.content:
THE FOURTH year of Clare Potter’s Market will take place within a 17th century farmyard at Ballymorris Pottery.

articles.title: Volcanic Eruptions Can Create Ice in The Sky, And We Finally Know How
articles.description: Satellites soaring high above Earth have revealed exactly how wispy clouds are created by the giant plumes of ash belched upwards in a volcanic eruption.
articles.content:

articles.title: A night to remember: Moon glows beside famous red star Antares today - Here's how to see it
articles.description: The waxing gibbous moon will glow close to the bright red star Antares in the Scorpius constellation.
articles.content:
Moon Glows Beside Famous Red Star Antares Today (Image: Canva)

articles.title: Dengue claims 2 lives in Mandaue
articles.description: TWO dengue-related deaths have been recorded in Mandaue City from Jan. 1 to May 25, 2025, compared to just one fatality during the same period
articles.content:
TWO dengue-related deaths have been recorded in Mandaue City from Jan. 1 to May 25, 2025, compared to just one fatality during the same period last year.
The victims were a five-year-old child from Barangay Centro and a 15-year-old teenager from Bara... [1874 chars]

articles.title: Health office reports 2 melioidosis deaths
articles.description: TWO individuals in the province of Siquijor who were found positive for melioidosis, an infectious disease, have died.
articles.content:
TWO individuals in the province of Siquijor who were found positive for melioidosis, an infectious disease, have died.
This was announced by the Siquijor Provincial Health Office (SPHO) on Monday, June 9, 2025.

articles.title: WWDC 2025 Live Updates: Apple Could Launch Redesigned iOS 26 Update, Siri Upgrades Unlikely to Arrive
articles.description: WWDC 2025 will start at 10:30pm IST on Monday, with Apple CEO Tim Cook expected to unveil significant software updates and features for the coming year. The keynote will likely showcase next-generation operating systems for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Apple TV, Apple Vision Pro, and Mac computers, while new hardware or devices are not expected to be announced at the event.

articles.title: Microsoft takes another swing at handhelds with new fullscreen Xbox experience, takes on Steam Deck and Switch 2
articles.description: After years of experiments and half-baked ideas, the company is now working closely with Asus to deliver a handheld experience that feels a lot more like a console than a PC. The result? Two new devices — the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X.
